name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
プロデューサーから返事来た～！

name: 円香
text:
まあ、誰でもいいけど
なんの連絡？
trans: Well, whoever that is, what does it say?

name: 雛菜
trans: Didn't you also get the message～?

name: チェイン
trans: 『It's fine if you're a little late today』

name: チェイン
text: 『雨が弱まってからゆっくりおいで』
trans: 『Take your time to drop by after the rain eases』

name: 円香
text: ゆっくり行けるんだし
trans: We can take our time anyway.

name: 円香
text: ……どこに行くのか、知らないけど
trans: ...I don't know where I'm heading to, though.

name: 円香
text:
暇なら暇で
いいんじゃない
trans:
It's fine, isn't it,
to be free when we're free.

name: 円香
trans: It's been busy recently, after all.

name: 雛菜
text:
……忙しかったのかもね～？
学校も休んでたみたいだし
trans:
...Maybe we did become busy, huh～?
We even had to miss a bit of school.

name: 円香
trans: That's why it's good to sometimes─

name: 雛菜
text: でも、円香先輩は暇だったでしょ～？
trans: But Madoka-senpai was pretty free, right～?

name: 円香
text:
暇ではないんじゃない？
普通に
trans:
You don't usually call my schedule as being free
though, right?

name: 円香
text: 混ざりながら、影絵が走る
trans: As it all mixes together, the shadow figure runs

name: 雛菜
text:
ここで～？
家に帰ればいいのに
trans:
Here～?
You can just go home, though.

name: 円香
text:
わかった……
家に帰って、寝る……
trans:
Got it...
I'll go home, and sleep...
